data.title: 1988 Al Jarreau – Heart’s Horizon
data.meta_description: Heart's Horizon was the 1oth studio album by Al Jarreau, released in 1988. The album reached nr 1 in the jazz charts, #75 in the US chart and #10 in the R&B charts. Alwin Lopez "Al" Jarreau (March 12, 1940 – February 12, 2017) was an American singer and musician. He received a total of
data.text:
